games.title: Space Invaders
games.description: Considered the game that revolutionized the video game industry. The first blockbuster video game, it established the shoot 'em up genre, and has influenced most shooter games since.

games.title: Centipede
games.description: One of the first games to use trackball control, vertical monitor orientation.

games.title: Gorf
games.description: Consisted of several levels, some of which were clones of other popular games. Featured synthesized speech.

games.title: Pac-Man
games.description: One of the most popular and influential games, it had the first gaming mascot, established maze chase genre, opened gaming to female audiences, and introduced power-ups and cutscenes.

games.title: Donkey Kong
games.description: Laid foundations for platform game genre as well as visual storytelling in video games, and introduced Mario, the character who would become Nintendo's mascot.

games.title: Paperboy
games.description: Novel controls and high resolution display
